name: Down The Pipe
description:
This game is my very first game and was created end to end only by myself with no used 3rd party assets. Game was designed for Android phones (get original version on Google Play Store), this is it's port

Controls:
steer left: left arrow / A
steer right: right arrows or A/D

What it is about?
Navigate alien ship through the set of pipes inside and out on it's surface through the series of obstacles while your speed is constantly increasing.

This casual game contains two play modes:

Infinite:
- option to select difficulty from Easy to Insane
- randomly generated levels
- various collectibles to either help you get further or gain higher score
- constantly increasing speed making it more difficult to navigate through
- leaderboard for each difficulty
- how far can you get? What score can you earn?

Challenge:
- challenging levels for experienced "pipers" to get some challenge
- levels are designed from ground up. Obstacles, speed, acceleration are set for each level individually
- no collectibles, only pure skill required
- will you be able to beat those challenges?
